ai-tha-ap84:2.2_0: I threw a stone down in the sky,
ai-tha-ap84:2.3_0: I shall attain the ocean of the Buddhas.
ai-tha-ap84:2.4_0: “I am the one who has virtue,
ai-tha-ap84:3.1_0: You should go to the Holy One’s teaching,
ai-tha-ap84:3.3_0: Then the lady with joined palms:
ai-tha-ap84:4.1_0: On the two occasions when the other goes forth
ai-tha-ap84:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap84:5.2_0: There are three fires that were flames.
ai-tha-ap84:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable goal.
ai-tha-ap84:8.1_0: he saw the Elder Nun Previously
